movie:b861858d-6e9b-49e5-a0a8-015b10ac39.overview: In this true story told through flashbacks, Christy Brown is born with crippling cerebral palsy into a poor, working-class Irish family. movie:bbf06e55-415b-485c-8c2c-8cd6ab2539.overview: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview, moves to oil-rich California. movie:a7e8bf42-2a54-4934-8f16-dac326cede.overview: Freddy Heflin is the sheriff of a place everyone calls “Cop Land” — a small and seemingly peaceful town populated by the big city police officers he’s long admired. movie:fc950e26-f475-40e0-96f6-347f70a909.overview: In late 1890s Wyoming, Butch Cassidy is the affable, clever and talkative leader of the outlaw Hole in the Wall Gang. His closest companion is the laconic dead-shot 'Sundance Kid'. As the west rapidly becomes civilized, the law finally catches up to Butch, Sundance and their gang. movie:38a9dc4f-11e6-47ce-aa2a-4155326253.overview: Newspaper magnate, Charles Foster Kane is taken from his mother as a boy and made the ward of a rich industrialist.
